title: electronic Long-Term Services and Supports Implementation Guide
introduction: electronic Long-Term Services and Supports Implementation Guide was developed to support exchange of data generated during the planning and provision of long-term services and supports and is currently scoped to data commonly found on LTSS service plans.

list.desc:
STU #2. This update addresses the following Jira trackers that were deemed to be non-substantial changes:
1) Add clarification text to CarePlan.partOf.comment. (<a href=
>FHIR-23046). 2) Clarify wording in the mappings for Goal. (
>FHIR-23047). 3) Add clarification in the mapping that printed name and name elements would include the same information. (
>FHIR-23059). 4)Update the .system values in the CarePlan and Planner examples. (
>FHIR-28148). 6) Add explanatory text to the Location profile on the Profile page. (
>FHIR-28149). 7) Include a link to a downloadable eLTSS to FHIR mapping spreadsheet. (
Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)
